import "./competence.scss"; export default function Competence() { const data = [ { id: 1, title: "Framework", img: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/1680172/pexels-photo-1680172.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&dpr=2&w=500", icon: "assets/twitter.png", desc: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Placeat magnam dolorem.", }, { id: 2, title: "Langages informatiques", img: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/428321/pexels-photo-428321.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&dpr=2&w=500", icon: "assets/youtube.png", desc: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Placeat magnam dolorem recusandae perspiciatis ducimus vel hic temporibus. ", featured: true, }, { id: 3, name: "Maîtrises informatiques", title: "Maîtrises informatiques", img: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/3863793/pexels-photo-3863793.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&dpr=2&w=500", icon: "assets/linkedin.png", desc: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Placeat magnam dolorem", }, ]; return (

Compétences

); }
